howGetApiKey: How to get an API key
tthowGetApiKeyPart1: An API key (token, company number) from the marketplace account  is essential to transfer data to external services, including our platform
tthowGetApiKeyPart2: Your privacy data is valued and respected, so be sure it won’t be disclosed. SeedXceed collects information via the secure https protocol with the SSl certificate, keeps an encrypted form, which guarantees their safety from unauthorized access by third parties
tthowGetApiKeyPart3: The platform has an international PCI DSS certificate, and provides reliable protection for transactions on a global level
wbSubtitle: For sales analysis, set up the vendor's profile with the API key. Go to 'Settings' on the Wildberries supplier portal'
wbHowTo2: Generate and copy the API key in Base64 format
wbHowTo4: Generate and copy the Token to work with the API
wbHowTo5: Enter the API key and Token in the «My profile» section on SeedXceed → «Marketplaces API», select the Wildberries marketplace and click «Save»
ozonSubtitle: To analyze sales on Ozon, connect the Vendor Profile by API-key
ozonHowTo1: In your profile go to 'Settings' → 'API keys'
ozonHowTo2: Click 'create a Key' name it - a list of your API keys will display
ozonHowTo4: Enter the key in section 'My Profile' → 'API Marketplaces', select the Ozon marketplace and click 'Save'
ymSubtitle: To analyze sales on Yandex Market, connect the Vendor Profile by API-key
ymHowTo1: In the Yandex Market personal account, go to Settings, copy the Campaign Number and save it
ymHowTo2c: and in the window that appears, allow access for our application
ymHowTo3с: select Settings → API Settings from the menu and copy the Campaign Number
ymHowTo3: On the Yandex page that appears, copy and save the generated Token
ymHowTo4: Enter the copied Campaign Number and Token in the service in the “My Profile” section - “Marketplace API”, choose Yandex Market marketplace and click “Save” button
mlSubtitle: To analyze your sales on Mercado Libre, you need to connect the supplier's account using the API key.
mlHowTo1: Log in to your Mercado Libre account using your account
mlHowTo2c: and confirm the launch of the application
mlHowTo3: In the window that appears, confirm the connection of the application with your account on Mercado Libre
mlHowTo4: Enter the copied token in the service in the section “My profile” → “Marketplace API”, select the Mercado Libre marketplace and click “Save”
